page.title: 14Employment
page.content: I went round the class to see what all classes mums and do for a living I have put into sentences all that people do.First the dads there are three engineers,one mechanical engineer,two have their own buisness,one makes torpedoes,one works in Cadburysand here are the rest:one dad does shipping, Royal insurance, Banking,B.B.C., British Telecom, Scientist,Holiday Buisness,North West Water,Police_man, Lift Inspector, Vicar. Here are the mums, six housewifes, dinner lady, birds eye, publish books,nurse,card shop,helps pensioners,dancing teacher,cadburys, and blood bank,two secreteries.these are the only ones in the square we're doing at the moment.....
